description: As every New Englander knows - and as illustrated by our Snowpack Over-the-Calf sock - it isn't the depth of the snow that matters, but the quality of the layers. Because just like the snowpack, when socks are knit with top-notch Merino Wool, increased durability, and a precise fit, the longer lasting (and more enjoyable) it will be in the end.
name: Darn Tough Socks Snowpack OTC Midweight Cushion Socks - Mens
